for_sales.sales_text: Padstow lugger, 14’8" black GRP hull, beam 5’4". Mahogany fit-out. Douglas fir masts/spars. Full inventory included in sale.
for_sales.summary: Padstow lugger, 14’8" black GRP hull, beam 5’4". Mahogany fit-out. Douglas fir masts/spars. Full inventory included in sale. Stored East Suffolk, will deliver at cost if required.

for_sales.sales_text:
Padstow Lugger Day boat. 15’ on deck 22’ over spars. GRP hull with teak gunwhales. solid wood spars. Steel centre plate.

Very stable, and easy to row.

Old sails, but still good.

Oars,

bilge pump,

2 covers.

Road trailer.

Fitted with leisure battery for use with electric trolling motor.

boat.full_description:
Made by the company Padstow Sea Boats in 1992. The design is based on the Cornish pilchard fishing boats. It is made from GRP and requires minimum maintenance. She has wooden spars and teak and mahogany trim. It is the perfect boat for exploring estuaries and rivers with a family on board.

She is stable with a weighty steel centreplate. She has a working boat rig, comprising of a jib and boom-less standing lug mainsail and mizzen.
boat.name: Tiki
